data.eml:eml: Composition of two campo rupestre communities from the Itacolomi State Park, Calais (present dataset), (related dataset: Lagoa Seca), MG, Brazil
We compared floristic composition, species richness and diversity from two sites, Lagoa Seca and Calais. Both surveys contained 15 plots of 10 x 10 m, cardinality of each species was estimated.
